name.br: Pergaminho de Amplificação de Grupo (30 dias)
name.jp: パーティ増幅の巻物（30日）
name.th: Scroll of Party Amplification (30 วัน)
name.tw: 劇團點數無限制卷軸(30天)

description.en: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.ar: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.br: Seu grupo irá receber o dobro de pontos quando elevar de nível. Duração de 7 dias. Note que o contador deste pergaminho continuará regressivo mesmo se você estiver desconectado.
description.cns: 当你的队伍达到新的等级将会获得双倍点数。持续30天。请注意，即使你离线状态，该物品将会计时并将继续递减。
description.de: Deine Gruppe erhält die doppelte Anzahl an Punkten, wenn sie eine neue Stufe erreicht. Hält 30 Tage. Beachte, dass der Zähler auf diesem Gegenstand weiterzählt, auch wenn du ausgeloggt bist.
description.fi: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.fil: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.fr: Pendant la durée du parchemin, les points de groupe obtenus à chaque niveau seront doublés. La durée de ce parchemin décroîtra même si vous êtes déconnecté. Dure 30 jours.
description.id: Party Anda akan mendapatkan dua kali lipat jumlah poin saat mencapai level baru. Berlangsung selama 30 hari. Perhatikan bahwa penghitung pada item ini akan terus menghitung mundur bahkan saat keluar.
description.it: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.jp: レベル上昇時のパーティポイントを2倍獲得する。（30日間有効で、ログアウト中も経過する）
description.kr: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.nl: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.pl: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.ru: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.sp: Al activarlo, el Grupo obtendrá el doble de puntos al alcanzar un nivel nuevo. (Dura 30 días desde la activación, incluso si se desconecta)
description.sw: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 30 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.th: ปาร์ตี้ของคุณจะได้รับคะแนนเป็นสองเท่าเมื่อไปถึงเลเวลใหม่ ระยะเวลาไอเท็ม 30 วัน โปรดทราบว่าเวลาไอเท็มนี้จะยังคงนับถอยหลังแม้ว่าจะออกจากระบบแล้ว
description.tw: 當你的劇團達到一個新的等級時，你將獲得兩倍的積分，持續30天。 請注意，即使離線，此項目上的計數器也會持續計時。
description.vi: Nhóm của bạn sẽ nhận được gấp đôi số điểm khi lên cấp độ mới. Kéo dài 30 ngày. Lưu ý rằng bộ đếm trên mặt hàng này sẽ tiếp tục đếm ngược ngay cả khi đã đăng xuất.
